mapper.select: SELECT N.Q_NUM, N.Q_TITLE, N.Q_CONTENTS, N.Q_UP_DATE, N.Q_CHECK, M.M_ID, C.Q_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TC_MEMBER M, TC_QNA N, TC_Q_CATEGORY C WHERE M.M_ID = N.M_ID AND C.Q_CATEGORY_NUM = N.Q_CATEGORY_NUM ORDER BY N.Q_NUM DESC
SELECT Q_NUM, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENTS, Q_UP_DATE, Q_CHECK, M_ID, Q_A_CONTENTS, Q_A_DATE, A_ID FROM TC_QNA WHERE Q_NUM = #{qNum}
